${ModID}:DividedFury.NAME: Divided Fury
${ModID}:DividedFury.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Fury into your hand.
${ModID}:DividedFury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Fury into your hand.

${ModID}:ViciousCycle.NAME: Vicious Cycle
${ModID}:ViciousCycle.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal an additional !D! damage for each card *ripped this turn.

${ModID}:ViciousCycleText.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal an additional !D! damage for each card *ripped this turn.

${ModID}:ArtAttack.NAME: Art Attack
${ModID}:ArtAttack.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL The ${ModID}:Art Card causes the target to lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:SurprisePack.NAME: Surprise Pack
${ModID}:SurprisePack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When *ripped, NL gain [E] [E].

${ModID}:Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
${ModID}:Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the number of ${ModID}:Art and Status Cards in your exhaust pile. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:InspirationText.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the number of ${ModID}:Art Cards in your exhaust pile.

${ModID}:FlimsyBash.NAME: Flimsy Bash
${ModID}:FlimsyBash.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:FragileShrug.NAME: Fragile Shrug
${ModID}:FragileShrug.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Draw !M! card. NL When *ripped, draw !M! card.

${ModID}:HazardousStrike.NAME: Hazardous Strike
${ModID}:HazardousStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL When *ripped, Exhaust !M! cards at random.

${ModID}:TotalWeakness.NAME: Total Weakness
${ModID}:TotalWeakness.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TotalWeaknessText.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LeftBrain.NAME: Left Brain
${ModID}:LeftBrain.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL your ${ModID}:Art and Status cards. Gain !M! Strength for each card Exhausted.
${ModID}:LeftBrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unnate. NL Exhaust ALL your ${ModID}:Art and Status cards. Gain !M! Strength for each card Exhausted.
